sentences.en: A third group of species with diagnostic value are the constant companions.
sentences.cn: 具有鉴别价值的第三组植物是恒有伴生种.

sentences.en: An intelligent computer will be an indispensable diagnostic tool for doctors.
sentences.cn: 智能计算机将成为医生不可或缺的诊断工具。

sentences.en: Both electrocardiograms and electroencephalograms are invaluable diagnostic tools in modern medicine.
sentences.cn: 心电图和脑电图在现代医学中是非常珍贵的诊断工具.

sentences.en: His diagnostic skills were regarded as remarkable.
sentences.cn: 人们认为,他的诊断能力卓尔不群.

sentences.en: Objective : To improve CT diagnostic value of extrusion disc in intervertebral foramen.
sentences.cn: 目的: 提高对椎间孔内腰椎间盘突出的CT诊断及临床意义的认识.

sentences.en: Objective : To study the diagnostic methods of mammary duct ectasia after operation.
sentences.cn: 目的: 探讨乳腺导管扩张症的术前诊断方法.

sentences.en: Objective To investigate the diagnostic value of ultrasound in acute appendicitis.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨超声检查在急性阑尾炎诊断中的应用价值.

sentences.en: One of the most important functions of the diagnostic microbiology laboratory.
sentences.cn: 微生物实验室诊断是最重要的手段之一.

sentences.en: The enzyme immunoassay diagnostic procedure was first described in 1971.
sentences.cn: 酶免疫试验的诊断操作方法是于1971年首次描述的.

sentences.en: The feature is not yet diagnostic.
The lack of good diagnostic test isn't fortunate.
sentences.cn: 缺乏好的诊断性测试是不利的.

sentences.en: The resistivity contours appear much less diagnostic of anomalous bodies below the surface.
sentences.cn: 地面下方的异常体,在视电阻率等值线上并无明显的反映.

sentences.en: The wireless set resumes its original state ( LSM ) after diagnostic communication.
sentences.cn: 诊断通讯结束后,无线电收音机重新回到诊断前状态 ( LSM ).

sentences.en: These features serve to decrease the level of diagnostic suspicion.
sentences.cn: 这些情况都降低了诊断的警惕性.

sentences.en: This failure mode would have been extremely difficult to detect with any other diagnostic technique.
sentences.cn: 这种失效模式用其他任何诊断技术来检测都将是极其困难的.

trans.tran_en: relating to or used for discovering what is wrong with someone or something

trans.tran_cn: 诊断法，诊断程式，诊断结论
